alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:25PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Churchill County through 145 PM PDT... At 124 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over US-50 near New Pass Summit. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects and vehicles are possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Churchill County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
